questionsAndAnswers.question:
Hello,

Could I stop by tomorrow Friday Feb 21 to get a flu vaccine??

Barbara Borns

answers.answer: Hi Barbara, We're closed right now but, we'll reach out to you tomorrow morning after we open back up to answer your question. Thank you for reaching out! Lisa
